The commandment of resting from work on Yom Kippur

hedesc: מצות שביתה ממלאכה ביום ראשון של חג הסכות
endesc: The commandment of resting on the first day of the holiday of Sukkot

hedesc: שלא לעשות מלאכה ביום ראשון של חג הסכות
endesc: To not do work on the first day of the holiday of Sukkot

hedesc: מצות קרבן מוסף בכל יום משבעת ימי הסכות
endesc: The commandment of the additional sacrifice on each day of the seven days of Sukkot

hedesc: מצות שביתה ממלאכה ביום שמיני של סכות
endesc: The commandment of resting from work on the eighth day of Sukkot

hedesc: מצות קרבן מוסף ביום שמיני של סכות שהוא נקרא שמיני עצרת
endesc: The commandment of the additional sacrifice on the eighth day of Sukkot, which is called Shemini Atseret

hedesc: שלא לעשות מלאכה ביום שמיני עצרת
endesc: To not do work on  day of the holiday of Shemini Atseret
The commandment of taking the lulav
The commandment of sitting in a sukkah (booth)
That we not work the land on the seventh year
That we also not do work with the trees
That we not harvest the aftergrowth on the seventh year

hedesc: שלא נאסף פרות האילן בשביעית כדרך שאוספין אותן בכל שנה
endesc: That we not gather the fruit of the trees in the seventh [year] in the manner that we gather them in every year
The commandment of counting the seven [cycles] of seven years

hedesc: מצות תקיעת שופר ביום הכפורים של יובל
endesc: The commandment of blowing the shofar on Yom Yippur of the Jubilee
The commandment of the sanctification of the Jubilee year
That we not work the land on the Jubilee year

hedesc: שלא נקצר ספיחי תבואות של שנת היובל
endesc: To not harvest the aftergrowth of the produce of the Jubilee year

hedesc: שלא לאסף פרות האילנות בשנת היובל כדרך שאוספים אותן בשאר השנים
endesc: To not gather the fruits of the trees on the Jubilee year in the manner that we gather them in other years

hedesc: מצות עשית דין בין לוקח ומוכר
endesc: The commandment of adjudicating between the buyer and the seller
To not mistreat in buying and selling
To not mistreat any Israelite with words

hedesc: שלא נמכר שדה בארץ ישראל לצמיתות
endesc: That we not sell a field in the Land of Israel in perpetuity
The commandment of returning land to its owners on the Jubilee

hedesc: מצות פדיון בתי ערי חומה עד השלמת שנה
endesc: The law of redemption of houses of walled cities until the completion of a year
To not change the open areas of the Levites
To not lend with interest to an Israelite

hedesc: שלא נעבד בעבד עברי עבדת בזיון כמו עבדת כנעני
endesc: That we not make a Hebrew slave perform demeaning work, like the work of a Canaanite (gentile) slave

hedesc: שלא נמכר עבד עברי על אבן המקח
endesc: That we not sell a Hebrew slave upon the auctioning stone

hedesc: שלא לעבד בעבד עברי בעבדת פרך
endesc: To not make a Hebrew slave perform oppressive work
The commandment of work with a Canaanite slave forever

hedesc: שלא להניח לגוי לעבד בעבד עברי הנמכר לו
endesc: To not allow a gentile to work a Hebrew slave sold to him

hedesc: שלא נשתחוה על אבן משכית אפילו לשם
endesc: That we not prostrate ourselves on a figured stone, even to God

hedesc: מצות מעריך אדם שיתן דמים הקצובים בתורה
endesc: The commandment that one who appraises a man give the value delineated in the Torah
To not exchange consecrated things

hedesc: מצות הממיר בהמת קרבן בבהמה אחרת שתהיינה שתיהן קדש
endesc: The commandment of the one who exchanges the beast of a sacrifice with another beast, such that both of them be consecrated

hedesc: מצות מעריך בהמה שיתן כפי שיעריכנה הכהן
endesc: The commandment of the appraisal of a beast, such that one give according to what the priest appraises

hedesc: מצות מעריך בתים שיתן כערך שיעריכנה הכהן ותוספת חמש
endesc: The commandment of appraising houses, such that he give the appraisal that the priest appraises and the addition of a fifth

hedesc: מצות מעריך שדה שיתן כערך הקצוב בפרשה
endesc: The commandment of appraising a field, that he give the appraisal specified in the section of the Torah
To not change the consecrated from a sacrifice to a sacrifice

hedesc: מצות דין מחרים מנכסיו שהוא לכהנים
endesc: The commandment of the law of one who dedicates from his properties, that it is of the priests

hedesc: שלא ימכר קרקע שהחרימו אותה בעלים אלא תנתן לכהנים
endesc: That owners that dedicated land not sell it, but that it rather be given to the priests
That a dedicated field not be redeemed

hedesc: מצות מעשר בהמה טהורה בכל שנה
endesc: The commandment of the tithe of pure beasts every year

hedesc: שלא למכר מעשר בהמה אלא יאכל בירושלים
endesc: To not sell the tithe of beasts, but rather that it be eaten in Jerusalem

hedesc: מצות שלוח טמאים חוץ למחנה שכינה
endesc: The commandment to send the impure out of the camp of the Divine Presence
That an impure person not enter the entire Temple
The commandment of confession of sin

hedesc: מצות סוטה שיביאנה הבעל אל הכהן ויעשה לה כמשפט הכתוב
endesc: The commandment of the suspected adulteress (sotah) for the husband to bring her to the priest and that he do to her according to the statute that is written
That we not put oil on the sotah sacrifice
Not to place frankincense on the sotah sacrifice

hedesc: שלא ישתה הנזיר יין או כל מיני שכר
endesc: That the nazirite not drink wine or all types of spirits
That the nazirite not eat damp grapes
That the nazirite not eat raisins
That the nazirite not eat the seeds of the grapes
That the nazirite not eat the peel of the grapes
That the nazirite not shave his hair
The commandment of growing the hair of the nazirite
That the nazirite not enter the tent of a dead body

hedesc: שלא יטמא הנזיר במת ובשאר טמאות
endesc: That the nazirite not become impure through a dead body or through other impurities
The commandment of shaving the nazirite and bringing his sacrifices
The commandment of the priestly blessing every day
The commandment of carrying the Ark on the shoulder

hedesc: מצות פסח שני בארבעה עשר באיר
endesc: The commandment of the second Pesach (Pesach Sheni) on the fourteenth of Iyar

hedesc: מצות פסח שני שיאכל על מצות ומרורים
endesc: The commandment that the second Pesach (Pesach Sheni) offering be eaten with matsot and maror (bitter herbs)

hedesc: שלא להותיר כלום מבשר הפסח שני למחרתו
endesc: Not to leave any meat from the Pesach Sheni sacrifice to its morrow

hedesc: שלא לשבר עצם מעצמות פסח שני
endesc: Not to break a bone from the bones of the Pesach Sheni sacrifice
The commandment of blowing the trumpets in the Temple and in war
The commandment of challah (dough-offering)
The commandment of fringes (tsitsit)

hedesc: שלא לתור אחר מחשבת הלב וראית העינים
endesc: To not wander after the thoughts of the heart and the vision of the eyes
The commandment to guard the Temple

hedesc: שלא יתעסקו הכהנים בעבודת הלוים ולא הלוים בעבודת כהנים
endesc: That the priests not be involved in the service of the the Levites and the Levites in the service of the priests
That a foreigner not serve in the Temple
To not nullify the guarding of the Temple
The commandment of redeeming the first-born of a man
To not redeem the first-born of a pure animal
The commandment of the service of the Levites in the Temple
The commandment of the first tithe

hedesc: מצות הלוים לתת מעשר מן המעשר
endesc: The commandment of the Levites to give a tithe from the tithe
The commandment of the red heifer
The commandment of the impurity of a dead body

hedesc: מצות מי נדה שמטמאין אדם טהור ומטהרין אדם טמא מטמאת מת בלבד
endesc: The Commandment of the niddah waters which render the pure, impure and only purify someone impure from the impurity of a dead body
The commandment of the laws of inheritance
The commandment of the regular [sacrifices] daily
The commandment of the additional sacrifice of Shabbat

hedesc: מצות קרבן מוסף בכל חדש וחדש
endesc: The commandment of the additional sacrifice on each and every month

hedesc: מצות קרבן מוסף ביום חג השבועות
endesc: The commandment of the additional sacrifice on the day of the festival of Shavouot
The commandment of shofar (horn) on Rosh Hashanah
The commandment of the law of the abrogation of vows
That we not profane our words from vows

hedesc: מצות ישראל לתת ערים ללוים לשבת בהן והן קולטות
endesc: The commandment on Israel to give cities within which the Levites may dwell, and they shelter

hedesc: שלא להרג מחיב קדם שיעמוד בדין
endesc: To not kill someone liable before he is brought to justice

hedesc: מצות בית דין לשלוח מכה נפש בשגגה מעירו לערי מקלט ועל הרוצח בעצמו ללכת שם
endesc: The commandment on the court to send one who smites a soul inadvertently from his city to the cities of refuge and upon the killer himself to go there

hedesc: שלא יורה העד בדין שהעיד בו בדיני נפשות
endesc: That the witness not issue a ruling in the case that he is testifying about in capital punishments

hedesc: שלא לקח כפר להציל ממות הרוצח
endesc: Not to take ransom to save the murderer from the death penalty

hedesc: שלא נקח כפר ממחיב גלות לפטרו מן הגלות
endesc: Not to take ransom from one liable for exile to exempt him from exile

hedesc: שלא למנות דין שאינו יודע בדיני התורה
endesc: Not to appoint a judge that that does not know the laws of the Torah
That a judge not fear in judgement
Not to desire the money of your friend
The commandment of the unification of God
The commandment of loving God
The commandment of Torah study
The law of the recitation of Shema morning and evening
The commandment of the tefillin of the arm
The commandment of the tefillin of the head
To affix a mezuzah on entrances

hedesc: שלא לנסות נביא אמת יותר מדאי
endesc: To not test a true prophet more than is necessary
The commandment of killing the seven nations

hedesc: שלא לחן ולרחם על עובד אלילים
endesc: To not grace and to have mercy on an idolater
To not marry with idolaters

hedesc: שלא להנות מצפוי עבודה זרה ומשמשיה
endesc: To not derive benefit from the coverings of idolatry and from its auxiliaries
To not benefit from an offering to idolatry

hedesc: לברך את השם אחר אכילת המזון
endesc: To bless God after eating food
The commandment of loving the strangers (converts)
The commandment of fearing God
The commandment of prayer
To cling to Torah sages
To swear in His name, may He be blessed, truthfully
To destroy idolatry and its auxiliaries

hedesc: שלא לאבד דברים שנקרא שמו יתברך עליהם
endesc: Not to destroy things upon which His name, may He be blessed, are called
That one brings all of his vows on the first festival
Not to sacrifice a sacrifice outside of the [Temple] yard

hedesc: מצוה להקריב כל הקרבנות בבית הבחירה
endesc: The commandment to sacrifice all the sacrifices in the Choice House
To redeem consecrated things upon which a blemish developed

hedesc: שלא לאכל מעשר שני של דגן חוץ לירושלים
endesc: To not eat from the second tithe of grain outside of Jerusalem

hedesc: שלא לאכל מעשר שני של תירוש חוץ לירושלים
endesc: To not eat the second tithe of wine outside of Jerusalem

hedesc: שלא לאכל מעשר שני של יצהר חוץ לירושלים
endesc: To not eat the second tithe of oil outside of Jerusalem

hedesc: שלא לאכל בכור תמים חוץ לירושלים
endesc: To not eat an unblemished first-born [animal] outside of Jerusalem

hedesc: שלא לאכל קדשי הקדשים חוץ לעזרה
endesc: To not eat higher-level consecrated foods (kodshai kodashim) outside of the [Temple] yard

hedesc: שלא לאכל קדשים קלים קדם זריקת דמים
endesc: To not eat lower-level consecrated foods (kodashim kalim) before the sprinkling of the bloods

hedesc: שלא יאכל כהן בכורים קדם הנחתם בעזרה
endesc: That the priest not eat the first-fruits (bikkurim) before their placement in the [Temple] yard

hedesc: שלא לעזב הלוי, מלתן לו מתנותיו
endesc: To not forsake the Levite, from giving him his gifts
The commandment of slaughter
To not eat a limb from the living
To bring consecrated things to the Choice House (Temple)
To not add to the commandments and their understanding
To not subtract from the commandments of the Torah

hedesc: שלא לשמע ממתנבא בשם עבודה זרה
endesc: To not listen to one who prophecies in the name of idolatry
To not love the seducer
To not leave the hatred towards the seducer
To not save the seducer
Not to advocate innocence for a seducer

hedesc: שלא למנע מללמד על המסית חובה
endesc: Not to refrain from advocating guilt for the seducer

hedesc: שלא להסית אחד מישראל לעבד עבודה זרה
endesc: To not seduce one of Israel to worship idolatry
The commandment of investigating the witnesses well
The burning of an enticed city and to kill its people
To not rebuild an enticed city
To not benefit from the property of an enticed city

hedesc: שלא להתגודד כמו עובדי עבודה זרה
endesc: To not gash ourselves, like the worshipers of idolatry
To not make a bald spot for the dead
To not eat from consecrated [animals] that have been disqualified
To check the signs of a bird
To not eat from the flying swarming creatures

hedesc: שלא לאכל מבשר בהמה חיה ועוף שמתו מאליהן
endesc: To not eat from the meat of a [domesticated] beast, a [wild] animal or a bird that has died by itself
The commandment of the second tithe
To separate the poor tithe

hedesc: שלא לתבע חוב שעברה עליו שביעית
endesc: To not claim a debt that the seventh year passed
The commandment to press the foreigner
That he release all of his loans in the seventh [year]

hedesc: שלא יאמץ את לבבו על העני
endesc: To not steel his heart against the poor
The commandment of charity (tsedekah)
To not refrain from lending before the sabbatical year
To not send a Hebrew slave empty
To endow him upon his leaving to freedom
To not work with consecrated things
To not shear the wool of consecrated [animals]
To not eat chamets after midday

hedesc: שלא להותיר מקרבן חגיגה עד יום שלישי
endesc: To not leave over from the festive (chagigah) sacrifice to the third day

hedesc: שלא להקריב קרבן פסח בבמת יחיד
endesc: To not sacrifice the Pesach sacrifice on the bamah (altar) of an individual
The commandment to rejoice on the festivals
To appear on the festivals in the Choice House
To not go up for the festival without a sacrifice
To appoint judges and officers
To not plant any tree-idols
To not erect a matsevah

hedesc: שלא להקריב קרבן בעל מום עובר
endesc: To not offer a sacrifice of [an animal] with a temporary blemish

hedesc: לשמע בקול בית דין בכל זמן
endesc: To listen to the voice of the court at all times
To not stray from their words
To appoint a king from Israel
To not establish a foreign king over us
That the king not amass many horses
To not ever dwell in the Land of Egypt
That the king not amass many wives

hedesc: שלא ירבה לו המלך כסף וזהב
endesc: That the king not amass much silver and gold for himself

hedesc: שיכתב המלך ספר תורה שני לעצמו
endesc: That the king write a second Torah scroll for himself

hedesc: שלא ינחל שבט לוי בארץ ישראל
endesc: That the tribe of Levi not inherit in the Land of Israel

hedesc: שלא יקח שבט לוי חלק בבזה
endesc: That the tribe of Levi not take a portion in the spoils
To give the foreleg, the jaw and the maw to the priest
To separate the great tithe for the priest
To give the first shearing to the priest

hedesc: להיות הכהנים והלוים עובדים במקדש למשמרות
endesc: That the priests and the Levites work in the Temple in shifts
To not engage in clairvoyance
To not do magic
To not invoke a charm
To not ask a master of ov
To not ask a yidaaoni
To not inquire of the dead
The commandment to heed a true prophet
To not prophecy falsely
To not prophesy in the name of idolatry
That we not fear from the killing of a false prophet
The commandment to prepare six cities of refuge
To not show pity upon the killer or injurer
To not remove a landmark

hedesc: שלא יקום דבר העדות בעד אחד
endesc: To not establish a matter of testimony with one witness
To do to the collusive witness like he colluded
To not be terrified or to be afraid in war
The commandment to anoint a priest for war
To send peace to the cities that we besiege
To not keep alive a soul of the seven nations
To not destroy fruit trees
To behead the calf in the riverbed
To not work or sow in that land

hedesc: לדון דין יפת תאר ככתוב בתורה
endesc: To execute the law of the one of beautiful form (yefat toar) as is written in the Torah
To not sell one of beautiful of form
Not to make her serve after he has intercourse with her
To hang one who is liable for hanging
To not leave one that is hung overnight

hedesc: לקברו בו ביום וכן כל המתים
endesc: To bury him on the same day, and so [too] all the dead
To return a lost item to an Israelite
To not avoid his eyes from it

hedesc: שלא להניח בהמת חברו נופלת תחת משאה
endesc: To not leave the beast of his fellow falling under its load
To load the load that has fallen [together] with his fellow
That a woman should not wear the adornments of a man
That a man should not wear the clothes of a woman
To not take the mother upon the young

hedesc: לשלח האם אם לקחה על הבנים
endesc: To send away the mother [bird] if he takes it upon the young
The commandment of a parapet
To not leave a stumbling block
To not plant forbidden mixtures in a vineyard
To not eat forbidden mixtures of the vineyard

hedesc: שלא לעשות מלאכה בשני מיני בהמות
endesc: To not do work with two species of animals
To not wear shaatnez
To marry a woman with a marriage contract and betrothal

hedesc: מצוה שתשב אשת מוציא שם רע תחתיו לעולם
endesc: The commandment that the wife of one who 'puts out a bad name' [about her] dwell with him forever
That he should not divorce her all of his days

hedesc: מצוה על בית דין לסקל המחוייב
endesc: The commandment upon the court to stone the one liable
Not to punish one coerced into a sin
The commandment on the rapist to marry the one he has raped
That he not divorce her all of his days
That a eunuch not marry a daughter of Israel
That a mamzer (a child born from a forbidden marriage) should not marry a daughter of Israel

hedesc: שלא יבוא עמוני ומואבי בקהל השם
endesc: That an Ammonite or a Moabite not enter the Congregation of the Lord
Not to seek their peace in a war

hedesc: שלא להרחיק אדומי דור שלישי מלבוא בקהל
endesc: Not to distance an Edomite of the third generation from coming into the congregation
To not distance an Egyptian of the third generation
That one impure should not enter the Temple mount
The commandment to set up a place in which to defecate
The commandment to set up  a spike to dig with

hedesc: שלא להסגיר עבד שברח אל אדוניו
endesc: Not to turn over a slave that fled from his master

hedesc: שלא להונות עבד הבורח אלינו מחוצה לארץ
endesc: To not oppress a slave who has fled to us, from outside the Land, to the Land [of Israel]

hedesc: שלא לבעול אשה בלא כתבה וקדושין
endesc: Not to have sexual relations with a woman without a marriage contract and betrothal

hedesc: שלא להקריב אתנן זונה ומחיר כלב
endesc: Not to bring the fee of a prostitute or the price of a dog
That the borrower not give interest to an Israelite
To lend to the gentile with interest

hedesc: שלא לאחר נדריו יותר משלשה רגלים
endesc: Not to delay his vows for more than three festivals
To fulfill what has come out of his lips, as he vowed

hedesc: מצוה להניח השכיר לאכול מהמחובר שעושה בו
endesc: The commandment to allow the wage-worker to eat from the attached [produce] upon which he is working

hedesc: שלא יקח הפועל בידו יותר על אכילתו
endesc: That the worker not take into his hand more than his eating
That the worker not eat during work time

hedesc: הרוצה לגרש את אשתו שיגרשנה בגט
endesc: That one who wants to divorce his wife divorce her with a bill (get)
That he not bring back his ex-wife from when she has married

hedesc: שלא יצא החתן מביתו כל השנה אפילו לצרכי צבור
endesc: That a groom should not go out from his home the whole year, even for the needs of the community

hedesc: מצוה שישמח החתן עם אשתו שנה אחת
endesc: The commandment that a groom rejoice with his wife for one year

hedesc: שלא ימשכן בחובו כלים שעושים בהם אכל נפש
endesc: That we not take as surety vessels in which life-sustaining food (ochel nefesh) is made
To not detach signs of tzaraat (a Biblical skin disease)
To not take surety from a debtor by force
To not prevent surety from its needy owner

hedesc: להחזיר המשכון לבעלים בעת שצריך לו
endesc: To return the surety to the owners at the time that he needs it
To give the wage of a wage-worker on its day

hedesc: שלא יעיד קרוב זה אל זה
endesc: That a relative not testify, one about the other
To not sway the judgement of a stranger or an orphan
To not take the garment of a widow as surety
To leave what is forgotten to the poor
To not go back to take what is forgotten
The commandment to lash the evildoer
To not increase in flogging him
To not muzzle an animal at the time of its work

hedesc: שלא תנשא היבמה לאחר עד שתחלץ
endesc: That a levirate wife not marry another until she is released
The commandment of levirate marriage
The commandment of release (chalitsah)

hedesc: מצוה להציל הנרדף בנפשו של רודף
endesc: The commandment to save the pursued with the life of the pursuer
To not have concern about the pursuer
To not hold over deficient weights and measures
To remember what Amalek did to us
To blot out his seed from the world
To not forget what he did to us
The commandment of recital over the first-fruits
The commandment of declaration of tithes
To not eat the second tithe in bereavement
To not eat the second tithe in impurity

hedesc: שלא להוציא דמי מעשר שני אלא באכילה ושתיה
endesc: To only expend monies of the second tithe for eating and drinking

hedesc: מצוה ללכת ולהדמות בדרכי השם יתברך
endesc: The commandment to walk in - and make oneself similar through - the ways of God, may He be blessed
To gather all of Israel on the festival of Sukkot

hedesc: לכתוב כל אחד ספר תורה לעצמו
endesc: For everyone to write a Torah scroll for himself
